tweets.text: RT @smartkarma: Inflation Rear View Mirror https://t.co/RPitKAY7NS
I really cannot tell these Pop Mart figurines and Funko Pops apart https://t.co/8S27R9CPXF

On SMIC: “It was a nice party trick... But they can’t produce them at scale... It’s one thing to make a single chip, but it’s another thing to have yield and volume.”

https://t.co/9Ub8kZ5PIR

I don't get why people obsess about morals when it comes to investing. 

If you buy Coca-Cola shares in the secondary market, will that impact consumption somehow? 

Or will buying Tesla accelerate EV adoption? https://t.co/ASXNGdal1v
